image.title: Redmi Note 11 Pro / Pro+ MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater

item.title: MIUI V12.5.3.0.RKTCNXM Recovery update for Redmi Note 11 Pro / Pro+ China
item.description:
New Stable Recovery update available!

Device: Redmi Note 11 Pro / Pro+ China

Codename: pissarro

Version: V12.5.3.0.RKTCNXM | 11.0

Size: 3.4 GB

MD5: 9e6ba0d7d1e1c903e5abbba6c01f7d47

Changelog:
[System]
Optimization: Charging speed for some scenarios
[Lock screen]
Fix: Lock screen items weren't displayed when super wallpapers and themes were combined
Fix: A flashing black line appeared when Fingerprint unlock was used
[Status bar, Notification shade]
Optimization: Third party theme compatibility for Notification shade
Optimization: Dark mode adjustments for notifications
Fix: Notifications weren't displayed correctly when App lock was used
Fix: Notification shade couldn't be opened in some cases
Fix: Floating notifications flashed when Second space was used
Fix: Player controls weren't always displayed in the Notification shade
Fix: Notification badges didn't always appear
Fix: Backgrounds weren't displayed correctly when notifications arrived and third party themes were used
Fix: Notifications weren't always displayed correctly when "Raise to wake" was used
Fix: Buttons weren't always displayed correctly on the notifications when Dark mode was on

Download: Here
